name: UpdateFastlyAccount
description:
Updates a Fastly account via Datadog integration.

Call this tool to update details of a Fastly account through the Datadog API. Useful for managing Fastly integration settings.

parameters.name: fastly_account_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Fastly account to update.

parameters.name: fastly_api_key
parameters.description: The API key for the Fastly account to be updated.

value_schema.description: The API key of the Fastly account.

parameters.name: fastly_account_name
parameters.description: The name of the Fastly account to update.

value_schema.description: The name of the Fastly account.

parameters.name: json_api_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type for the Fastly account API. Must be 'fastly-accounts'.

value_schema.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `fastly-accounts`.
